sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <v-app-bar app color="black">
      <v-toolbar-title class="white--text">VOTER</v-toolbar-title>
      <v-spacer></v-spacer>
      <v-btn text class="white--text">
        CREATE ROOM
      </v-btn>
      <v-btn text class="white--text">
        LOGIN
      </v-btn>
      <v-btn text class="white--text">
        REGISTRATION
      </v-btn>
    </v-app-bar>
    <!-- Ostatak vaše komponente -->
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  name: 'AppNavbar',
  data() {
    return {
      background: require('@/assets/Background.png')
    };
  }
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.v-application--wrap {
  min-height: 100vh;
}

/* Ovdje postavljamo stilove za pozadinu */
.v-application {
  background-image: url('@/assets/Background.png');
  background-size: cover; /* Osigurava da se pozadina pravilno skalira */
  background-repeat: no-repeat; /* Sprječava ponavljanje slike */
  background-attachment: fixed; /* Sprječava pomicanje slike prilikom skrolanja */
  background-position: center center; /* Centrira sliku */
}

/* Dodajemo bijelu boju tekstu u naslovu */
.white--text {
  color: white !important;
}
</style>
